description_html: The Mira XL Table designed by Mac Stopa for Casali brings modern art to the office/contract environment. The minimalistic light organic shaped table is decorated with a cool semi-translucent 3D Mesh pattern, creating multiple artistic expressions. Its octagonal-shaped tabletop is made of 12 mm extra-clear glass supported by four polished aluminum legs. The curved geometry of the table leg corresponds with the geometry of the tabletop and its rounded corners. The Mesh pattern on the glass beautifully reflects on the floor below as well as on the polished aluminum legs. The Mira XL Table’s outstanding design, quality materials and craftsmanship are not its only attributes. Thanks to the special connection system, the table’s legs are easily detachable making the table easy to move and transport. Made in Italy.
product_name: Mira XL Table by Mac Stopa for Casali
